Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension® clinical chemistry system with the heterogeneous immunoassay module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension MPO Flex® reagent cartridge, calibrator, and control for quantitative myeloperoxidase measurement in plasma using the Dimension® clinical chemistry system.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of myeloperoxidase in human plasma to aid, with clinical history, ECG, and cardiac biomarkers, in evaluating patients with chest pain at risk for major adverse cardiac events including myocardial infarction, need for revascularization, or death.
